name: Elden Dungeon
description:
YOU CAN'T ESCAPE!!!

Elden Dungeon is a single-player action-adventure dungeon crawler game where you play as a character who was kidnapped and wakes up in a dungeon cell without any memories. You need to defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and explore the dungeon to escape from it. But while you progress through the dungeon, strange things start to happen, and unexpected situations appear. Will you be able to find the truth and escape from the dungeon?

Open "sameboy.exe" and drag the rom there.

Have fun!

Use the arrow keys to walk.

Press "X" to interact.

Press "Z" to attack.

Press "Enter" to pause the game.
